===Etymology===
* '''[[w:Warring States Period|Warring States Period]]:''' ''anon.'', ''[[w:Book of Rites|Book of Rites]]''
*: '''禮尚往來'''，[[往]][[而]][[不]][[來]]，[[非禮]][[也]]，[[來]][[而]][[不]][[往]]，[[亦]][[非禮]][[也]]。
*:: '''''[[w:li (Confucian)|Li]] places an importance on the extending and receiving (of it)'''. If it is extended, but not received, (this) is not [[w:li (Confucian)|li]]. If it is received, but not extended, (this) is likewise not [[w:li (Confucian)|li]].''
